The female vertuoso's a comedy : as it is acted at the Queen's Theatre, by Their Majesties servants / written by Mr. Thomas Wright. Wright, Thomas, fl. 1693. Molière, 1622-1673. Femmes savantes.
[8], 52 p.
Printed by J. Wilde for R. Vincent ..., London : 1693.
In part an adaptation of Molière's "Les femmes savan'tes." Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
